Repeatable Automated Deployments

Spinnaker pipelines let you easily define repeatable configurations via pipelines and strategies.

A global view for your cloud

Easily navigate your cloud resources across accounts and cloud providers.

Easy to extend and integrate

Spinnaker offers a robust API that is easy to extend. Plug in your own stages or even contribute your own cloud provider integration.

Resources

Spinnaker source code is available on Github.

For discussion and questions, use Stack Overflow.

For additional support, ask us in Slack.
